dcterms:description: The TREC Spotify Podcast Dataset contains 105,360 podcast episodes from 18,376 shows produced by 17,473 creators, with an average duration of 30 minutes.

dcterms:description: The Brass Set is derived from the TREC Spotify Podcast Dataset, consisting of 66,245 podcast episodes filtered based on specific criteria.
